title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7651.33 - Health systems records and data
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7651.33 - Health systems records and data

State Regulations

Nothing in this Part shall prevent access by the commission
or any employee designated by the chairman of the commission to any and all
records maintained by the department or any correctional facility or to any
information from any employee of the department, including but not limited to
telephonic consultation, pertaining to any inmate's medical
treatment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7651.33

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter V
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
